author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Coronavirus: The grim crisis in Europe's care homes
description: News is emerging of growing numbers of deaths from coronavirus in care homes across Europe.
content:
Image copyrightReutersImage caption
 Sixteen people have died at the Rothschild care home in Paris
Deaths can be invisible, coffins are hard to hide.
Outside the Rothschild care home in Paris, a delivery van pulls up to unload its pale wooden cargo, still … [+5041 chars]
